translation: Let him put his trust in God.
And put your trust in God.
And He is the Most High
And so that he may know
He will cause you to die
We put our trust in God.
They are trying to exploit you
They will commit a crime against you
He will take care of them
So it is incumbent upon her
We will cause you to die
They are urging you to hurry.
By the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful
And We will surely recompense them
And a bearer of good tidings
And We will surely test you
So put your trust in God.
You have associated partners with God
We have explained it in detail
